about.title: About
about.subtitle: Read about me...
about.info:
My name is Krzysztof and i live in Pozna≈Ñ. I'm a Freelancer / Front-end
 Developer.
 I create modern websites using Html, Css, Js and many frameworks. My pages are always
 crafted with attention to finer details and care of semantics. As a perfectionist I attach
 grate importance to the quality of the code. I constantly strive to develop and improve my
 skills to make my projects even better and better.
about.info2: Determined, reliable, working with full commitment

skills.title: Skills
skills.subtitle: Technologies and tools that I use on a daily basis
skills.text: As a skilled web developer, I specialize in using technologies such as HTML, CSS, TypeScript, and Angular to create dynamic and responsive web applications. In designing user interfaces, I apply Materials UI and Bootstrap, ensuring both efficiency and aesthetic appeal. Docker and REST API are crucial in my daily work, enabling effective and reliable communication with servers. Tools like Git and Jira are indispensable for project management and team collaboration, allowing for smooth organization and coordination.
